From:

Date: Wed, 17 Apr 2019 20:05:19 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Thanks! 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, April 17, 2019 10:25 AM 
To 
Subject: FW: Call from 
SDNY 
Hi 
Here you go.Mas been dealing with the First Assistant in MDFL, 
Hope this is helpful. 
From 
Sent: Wednesday, April 17, 2019 10:22 AM 
To 
Su ject: RE: Call from SDNY 
I last dealt with in the Middle District of Florida. She is the First Assistant who would likely have the 
authority to issue the letter authorizing SDNY access to grand jury materials our office developed. 
From: 
Sent: werinesday. Anril 
17. 7019 
9:51 AM 
To 
Subject: FW: Call from SDNY 
Following up on this. 
Thanks 
From 
Sent: Friday, April 5, 2019 2:24 PM 
EFTA00016962

To 
Subject: Call from SONY 
Just received a  call from the Crim Chief in SONY. SDNY has an open criminal matter involving Jeff 
Epstein. They understand we are recused and have shared nothing about the matter. The 
purpose of the call concerned their efforts to obtain from the FBI in the SDFL the evidence 
gathered as part of the SDFL Epstein investigation. The Miami FBI has expressed a reluctance to 
send any 6e materials to the SDNY FBI without a 6e letter. Given our recusal from the 
underlying criminal matter, I don't believe we should be the ones to give the FBI the go-ahead 
or the 6e letter. We no longer control that evidence. 
Do you have the name and contact information for the new USAO/AUSA handling our old 
criminal case? I think the best bet is to put SDNY in touch with that AUSA. 
Thanks 
EFTA00016963
